inn1.comm: edged and fell short of second slip, full outside off, drawing him forward, he lunges to dab it into the off side, the away movement takes the outside edge but he's played it with soft hands
short outside off, chases it, upper cuts it on the bounce to Harwood at third man
good probing line outside off, no movement on that one, Gibbs shoulders arms
down the leg side, holding its line again, Gibbs lets it go
in the channel outside off stump, moving away just a touch, left alone
teasing him outside the off stump but Gibbs restrains himself, leaves it be
good carry, full outside off, on a driving length but Gibbs is patient, leaves it promptly and Haddin takes it on his waist
full outside off and moving away, dabbed gently between cover and mid-off for a single, swing rightaway for Johnson
swinging into Gibbs, almost yorker length but he handles it well, closing the face and stealing a couple wide of midwicket
short of a length outside off but not wide enough to cut, bowled at 134.2 kmph, left alone
chases it this time, bowled much quicker at over 140, goes for a cut, misses and Haddin takes it over his head
good length outside off, holding its line, Gibbs, expecting it to move into him plays inside the line, misses
beaten with a slightly shorter one this time, short of a good length outside off and moving away, attempts a prod only to be almost done in by the away movement
full and wide, the openers are taking no risks early on, left alone to Haddin
short of a good length outside off, tries to chop it down to third man, gets an inside edge towards the keeper

back of a length and jagged back in this time, Smith tried to drop it on the leg side but gets an inside edge onto his pads and the ball almost takes out the stumps rolling back, didn't have enough pace on it
a touch fuller on the off stump, guided to third man for a single
full on the off stump, pushed gently into the off side short of cover and they scamper a quick single
short outside off, makes room, rolls his wrists over it and runs it down to third man
a fraction short on the off stump, pulled away wide of fine leg, just a single though, well struck but not really in the gap
full and wide, too wide, he's down the track and Johnson probably saw him do so and fired it out of his reach, gifts a run though
first boundary, full outside off, reaches forward and square-drives it uppishly but safely wide of point
short outside off, tries to hammer that wide of midwicket but is a little too early into the shot, misses
slower ball bowled short outside off, an offcutter, Gibbs gets back to defend but fails to make contact as it zips away
back to normal speed, hurled full and wide, bowled at 142.7 kmph, Gibbs gets forward but offers no stroke
held it back a little, good length on the off stump, angled down to third man
testing line outside off, gets forward and pushes it to point
good length on middle and off, takes a couple of steps forward, plays it short of cover for a quick single
good length outside off and a hint of inward movement, left alone to the keeper
fuller on the off stump, gets forward and defends it solidly back to the bowler
slightly short on the off, gets back, opens the face and punches it to point
fuller on the off stump, worked away behind square with a slight shuffle for a single
full on leg stump, pushed gently to mid-on
yorker outside leg, not too wide, dug out awkwardly to the bowler, didn;t have to actually, would have gone down
good length on the off stump, pushed to cover
short of a good length on the off stump, tries to cut behind square, gets an under-edge towards the keeper
straight on middle, whipped away off his pads wide of square leg for a couple
short of a length outside off, goes for a monstrous cut but is a little too wide, bowled at a decent pace as well, at 149.1 kmph, a little too quick, misses
in the slot and Gibbs cashes in, slaps it uppishly wide of the bowler, bowled really full outside off, mid-on is a little wide and it beat him easily to the boundary
good length on the off, defends it cautiously to cover
harmless delivery outside off and Gibbs is onto it, charges down the track and smacks in the wide long-on region for a one bounce four

nipped back in sharply and caught him a little off guard, short of a good length outside off and he got back to defend, was fortunate to get an inside edge onto his pads or else he was in danger of being trapped in front
fuller outside off, eased to cover off the front foot
back of a length on middle, tucked away wide of square leg for a couple, walked a fair way across the stumps there
Smith getting into the act now, fed with a juicy half-volley outside off, waits for it, gets forward and drives it crisply through the covers
good length on middle and leg. driven to mid-on
much shorter but the variations in length are proving of no use against Smith, who is onto it quickly and punches it wide of a diving cover, elegantly done
back of a length outside off, dabbed to third man
full and wide, tempting Gibbs into the drive, or trying to rather, but the batsmen is in a determined mood, here, leaves it be
back of a length outside off, crunched to cover, sped off the bat but the fielder is positioned perfectly
full outside off, hangs his bat out to defend, gets an outside edge wide of slip for a single, no danger of getting caught there, played it late
full on the off stump, swats it to mid-on, an aggressive shot that but fails to find the gap
back of a length on the off stump, pushed off the back foot to cover
banged in short on the off stump, came onto Gibbs really slowly, he charged down the track and tried to heave that wide of midwicket, is too early into the short and is struck on the shoulder
gets it right this time, short again on the off stump, bowled at the right pace for Gibbs to rock back and pull it away wide of square leg
short of a length on the off stump, guided straight to gully, needs to get it fuller
starts well, goodish length on the off stump, played slightly across the line towards mid-on
pretty good pace, bowled at 143.2 kmph, short of a length on the off stump, run down to third man
good zip, much quicker at 146.3, a touch too straight though but surprises Gibbs a touch who tries to work it away wide of square but is struck on the ribs
full on the off stump, hitting the bat hard is Harwood, defended on the leg side
good stuff, teasing length on the off stump, dropped towards cover
just a fraction short outside off, dabbed to third man for a single, he'll be satisfied with that effort, a decent first over

Hopes strikes! Just a fraction short outside off, Smith comes down the pitch while simultaneously giving himself some room, slashes hard but gets a thick edge, actually off the bottom of the bat straight to Haddin who accepts it gleefully
good length outside off and moving away, left alone to the keeper
back of a length outside off, shaping away from the right hander, left alone
probing him outside off, defended off the front foot to cover
fuller on the off stump, gets his foot forward and bunts it to cover
full on middle and leg, flicked away straight to midwicket where Ponting, unnecessarily throws down the stumps at the strikers end to allow the batsmen a single off the ricochet
bowls according to his field, short of a good length outside off, a hint of movement away from the batsman, left alone
short and wide, chops it down to third man for a single
a touch fuller outside off, bowled at 145.6 kmph, Gibbs charges down and tries to drag that wide of mid-on, mistimes it but gets a single nevertheless
full on middle and leg, turned away wide of mid-on for a single, the crowd cheer their team reaching fifty
banged in short on the off stump, a bouncer, a harmless one though, too high and the umpire calls it
shortish outside off, pulled away towards deep midwicket who runs well to his left and fields well to keep them down to a single
full on the off stump, driven through the line to mid-off, all style there from Kallis but no runs, not a criticism that, perhaps he didn't intend to hit that for a boundary
short on middle, tries to pull it behind square, struck high on the pads
full outside off, opens the face to guide it really fine, wide of the keeper for a couple
on middle and leg and angling in, driven towards midwicket
good length outside off, makes room, charges down and drives it over mid-off, beautifully timed
back of a length on middle, tucked away to square leg
good length on middle and leg, driven firmly through the line but towards a ready long-on who cuts it off and keeps them to just a single.
Harwood bangs that in short outside off and Gibbs treats that the way it should be, rocks back and hammers it wide of mid-on
short again but not as much as the previous ball, guided down to third man for a single
full outside off and a touch of away movement, Kallis goes for a blazing drive through the covers but is beaten by the movement
good length on middle and off, pushed to cover off the front foot
held it back this time, cut away to third man for a single
good bouncer banged in short on middle, Kallis ducks under it well, Harwood stares intently but one isn't sure if Kallis reacted
back of a length on the off stump, dabbed short of point for a quick single
slower ball bowled short on middle, fails to spot it and is already into an attempted pull behind square, is hit on the shoulder

full and wide, comes down the track and mistimes an attempted loft over mid-on just wide of the bowler, one could hear the four-letter word pretty clearly after that delivery, it may just have been the batsman for having missed out
good length on middle and off, pushed to cover off the front foot
much fuller and he eases into the shot, reaching forward and playing it straight to cover
Slower ball bowled short of a length outside off, rolls his wrists over it to play it behind point for a single
Kallis plays and misses for the umpteenth time, slightly short of a length and he tries to cut that monstrously over point, misses
short of a length outside off, run down wide of slip for a single to third man
not too short but goes for the cut anyway, gets an under-edge to the keeper
fired it in on the off stump from wide of the crease, slightly short, defended off the back foot in the direction of cover
full on the off stump, opens the face and the last moment to ease it to third man
short of a good length on the off, defended towards cover off the back foot
attempts a Dougie Marillier paddle-scoop, earns him a couple, fine leg is slightly wide
slightly short on the off stump, punched wide of a diving cover for a single to long-off
imperious! Full outside off, he takes a couple of steps and lofts it well over the long-off boundary, struck through the line and timed perfectly, went a long way
short outside leg stump and Kallis just helps that to the fine-leg boundary, easily done and Bracken's return into the attack has proved costly
better, on and outside off, defended watchfully to cover
fullish on the off stump, bunts it wide of cover for a single
short of a good length outside off, made room and tried to chop it wide of point ,missed
calls it a wide, a patchy decision that, wasn't too wide of the off stump, swung away as Kallis let it go
short on leg stump, tries to defend it off the back foot but is struck on the ribs, the ball drops dead short of square leg and they scamper a quick run
attempted yorker, Gibbs made room to strike that through the covers but adjusted well to the length to dig it out to cover
full on the off stump, driven through to deep cover for a single

Harwood gets his maiden ODI wicket! Banged in short outside off, Kallis times that a little too well for his liking, upper-cuts it straight to third man, who's right at the edge waiting for it and takes a well-judged catch bending forward
good length on the off stump, defended off the front foot to cover
back of a length on the off, punched wide of cover but some sharp fielding by Hauritz who dives well to is left, prevents a single
short of a length outside off, guided wide of point towards third man
full outside off, gets forward and guides it to point
back of a length on the off stump, defended in front of cover
full on middle and off, a hint of away movement, plays inside the line to that but but is saved by the outside edge, the ball rolls wide of point and they manage a single
on middle and leg, dropped into the leg side short of the bowler for a single
bowled full on the off stump from wide of the crease, driven firmly between long-off and deep cover for a couple, he's on 47 now
a slower bouncer, Gibbs spotted it and tried to help it to fine leg but it was a touch too high
low full toss on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler who fails to hold on while diving forward and allows a single
short of a length on the off stump, chopped to point off the back foot
full on middle and leg, tucked through the vacant on-side field for a single
well played, bowled short on middle, de Villiers is down the track, makes room and guides that wide of a diving Clarke at point for a couple
short and wide and he gets four this time, bends low and cuts it between point and cover for a boundary to bring up the South African 100
fullish on the off stump, square-driven wide of cover for a single, a fielder's been pushed back
slower ball bowled full on the off stump, guided to third man, played with really soft hands
short of a good length on the off stump, defended solidly in the direction of cover
back of a length on the off, coming on nicely to de Villiers, punched to deep cover, good bounce
does well to give Gibbs the strike, stump-to-stump, on middle and off, dropped short of the bowler for a quick single

on middle and leg, closes the face to work it towards fine leg for a single to bring up his 37th ODI half-century, it's been a steady innings. He started off slowly but opened up gradually to keep South Africa going on a competitive pitch
short of a length on leg stump, whipped away to fine leg
driven back past the bowler for a single to long-on
fullish on the off stump, pushed between point and cover for a single
low full toss on middle, driven down the ground to long-on for a single
flighted on the off stump, is a little too early into the short, almost gets a leading edge to the bowler as the ball spins in
handles it well this time, walks across and driven wide of midwicket for a single
flighted on middle and leg, bunts it to deep square leg for a single

appeal for lbw, fired in quick and full on the off and it spun in, Gibbs got a long way across to sweep it fine, was struck on the pads but perhaps just a slightly outside the line, too close to call, the ball rolls down wide of short fine
quicker one bowled full again, but outside off this time, swatted wide of midwicket for a single
fullish outside off, driven firmly between long-off and deep cover for a couple
good length on the off stump, defended to cover
cheeky, just a fraction wide of the off stump, waits for it and turns the face and the last moment to clip it wide of fine leg
struck well and through the gap between mid-off and cover, for the second time in the over, two more
full on the off stump, tries to turn it away wide of square, mistimes it and the ball lands dead on the off side

missed runout, risky, tries to drive it wide of cover, gets a thick inside edge behind square, scampers back for the second but the throw from the deep is a good one, just evades the stump by a whisker and had that hit, Gibbs was a gonner
full outside off, steered wide of point for a single
whipped away off the pads behind square for a run
flat and short on the off stump, turning in sharply, worked away towards deep square leg
full on middle, gets front and across and flicks it into the deep on the leg side for a single
flighted on the off stump, drives it wristily wide of midwicket
back of a length on the off, dropped into the leg side wide of the bowler for quick single
short of a length, Hopes slips and falls badly on the follow through, the ball bounces over him towards mid-off
on the stumps this time, clipped off his pads to fine leg
almost had him there, good length on middle and he lofted it lazily over the in-field to just about evade mid-on
full outside off, slapped towards mid-off for a quick single
full on the off, eased to cover, just a defense without much intent
quicker one bowled full on the off stump, pushed to midwicket
slower through the air, on middle and leg, turned away wide of short fine
was waiting for it for ages and cashed in when the opportunity presented itself, tossed up on middle, down the track, takes it on the full and deposits it over the long-on boundary with a golf swing
flighted on the off, pushed back firmly to the bowler
slightly short on middle and off, turned away to fine leg
tossed up on the off stump, pushed wide of cover for a single
flat and slightly short on middle, pushed back to the bowler
tossed up on the off stump, paddled behind square for a single
full on the off stump, driven through the line to long-off
fullish on middle and leg, driven wristily towards deep midwicket
dipping into the right hander, flat on middle, holding its line, driven back to the bowler
bringing it back into the right hander, good length on the off stump and moving back in, turned wide of square leg
full and wide but de Villiers doesn't go after it, leaves it alone
full outside off, tries to drive it through the line wide of mid-off, mistimes it back to the bowler
fullish on the off stump, defended solidly to cover, good over so far
back of a length on the off, turned away wide of midwicket for a single, first runs off the over
bouncer banged in short on middle, tries to pull it behind square but it's onto him a lot quicker than expected, misses
flat and quick on the off stump, chipped wide of deep cover for a single
good length on middle and off, pushed back to the bowler
flighted on the off stump, driven to cover, these dot balls can be frustrating
gets forward and guides it wide of short third man for a single
flighted on middle and leg, driven off the front foot wide of deep square leg
full on the off stump, driven through the line to mid-off
back of a length on middle, turned wide of midwicket off the back foot for a single
short outside off, makes room and swats it back past the bowler for a single wide of mid-off, 150 up
swinging into the right hander, full on the off stump and driven to mid-on
yorker on middle, dug out wide of the bowler to mid-on again
fullish outside off, caressed through the off side towards deep cover for a single
there's that chip over cover again but is into the gap this time, between long-off and deep cover for a well-timed couple
quick on middle and leg, clips his pads and rolls wide of midwicket
low full toss on the off stump, driven firmly past the bowler wide of long-off for a couple
atrocious ball and gets the treatment, waist-high full toss on middle, pulled away into the stands behind deep midwicket
eased into the off side wide of cover for a single
fired in quick down the leg side, gets a faint tickle as he tries to sweep, proves effective as it beats the short-fine fielder to the fine-leg boundary
pushed into the off side towards cover
quicker ball bowled full on the off stump, steps down the pitch, fetches it from the off and dismisses that into the stands behind long-on, a massive hit that
tucked away into the leg side for a single
driven off the front foot towards midwicket
flighted on the off stump, flicked away but straight to midwicket
full on the off stump, driven through the line to cover

full on the off stump, a hint of aggression in that shot as he tries to force that wide of cover, succeeds in doing so, it takes a while for long-off to run across and cut that off and they manage a couple
Gibbs in fine flow here, just a fraction full on the off stump, he drills that down the ground past Bracken, no chance for long-off to cut that one
follows that up with a gentle dab wide of point for a single
full outside off, stroked firmly and crisply to deep cover, good sound of bat hitting ball but there's a fielder in the deep so he'll have to reconcile himself with just a single
slower ball bowled on a good length on the off stump, an offcutter, guided to point
quicker one bowled on a good length on the off stump, comes down the track and chips it to long-on
tossed up, lands fullish on the off stump, spins in to strike him high on the pads as he tries to sweep it square, was going down
short of a length on middle, pulled away to square leg, will feel he missed out there
in the slot, tossed up on middle, is down the track and smashes it powerfully over the bowlers head for a flat six, hit the advertising hoardings near the sight screen and darted back onto the field
bigger, similar length, still gave it some air, de Villiers got stuck into it, launching that one well over deep midwicket to bring up his 18th ODI fifty
South Africa on the move here, just a fraction full outside off, charges down and swats that wide of mid-off. He's on 98 now
short on middle and off, pulled away uppishly between long-on and deep midwicket, brings up his 21st ODI century, and we can expect him to 0pen up even more now that he's reached his landmark
short of a good length outside off, slashed away to third man
short and wide, chopped down to deep point
fullish on the off stump, square-drives it to deep point off the front foot
short on leg stump, paddled down to fine leg
bowled flat on middle, driven through the line back to the bowler

dropped, flighted on middle, comes down the track and strikes it wide of a diving Ferguson at long-on, it's a touch chance, bending and stretching low to his left, fails to hold on and dabs it over the ropes
pushed off the front foot between long-on and deep midwicket for a couple
flicked away to deep square leg, full on middle and leg
full and straight, driven firmly back to the bowler, Hauritz is quick to react and fields well
full toss on the off stump, driven wide of deep cover for two more
shuffled across to paddle it fine but it's not full enough, adjusts well to play it to midwicket
will feel he missed out there, low full toss on the off stump, played straight to cover
slower bouncer banged in on middle, Gibbs backs away, a little too high but the umpire decides against calling that a wide
full on the off stump, makes room and strikes it down the ground to long-off
neatly struck but straight to deep cover, a textbook drive that, full and straight on the off stump and hit through the line, all that for just a run
short on middle, gets back and punches it to long-on
slower ball bowled flat outside leg stump, a horrible delivery that, picked cleanly over short fine, anything less than a four and Gibbs would have lost it

he goes, after an excellent knock! Bracken pushed it full this time, on middle, Gibbs made room and attempted to loft that over long-on, timed it well but not well enough, found Clarke in the deep who took it comfortably
bowled on the pads, clipped wide of square leg for a single
short of a good length on the off stump, punched off the back foot towards cover
short of a length on the off stump, makes room and swats it wide of deep point
tossed up on middle, driven off the front foot to long-on
fired in on middle and leg from round the wicket, turned wide of midwicket but fails to get the single
flat on the off stump, dropped short of point for a single
flighted on middle and leg, eased through the off side for a single
quicker one on the off stump, guided wide of point for a quick run
length ball outside off, struck from the crease to cover
full on middle and leg, flicked away firmly behind square, there's a wide gap between square leg and short fine and he finds it perfectly to earn a boundary
full on middle and leg, driven straight to midwicket
full on the off stump, shuffles across slightly, picks it up cleanly to cart it over mid-on for the second four of the over
low full toss outside off, makes room and slices it just short of short third man

bowled'im! Came back in after landing on a good length outside off, Morkel tried to guide that to third man from the crease but was late into the shot, the ball jagged back in sharply to beat his bat and clip off stump
the runs keep flowing, full outside leg stump, a poor ball in the circumstances, glances it fine, no difficulty there
full on middle and off, pushed firmly but straight to cover
good length on middle and off, driven through the line to long-off
good length on the off stump, pushed firmly back to the bowler and Hopes does well, diving forward to field it on his follow through
length ball on the off stump, driven down the ground to long-off for a single to keep the strike
on middle and leg, pushed watchfully to Johnson
slower ball bowled full outside off, a touch too wide, Boucher reaches for it and drives it crisply between cover and cover point for his first boundary
too wide, the batsman stretches to get his bat to it but doesn't connect
good length on the off stump, pushed wide of cover for a single

bowled on a good length on middle and leg, not quite full for the waft over midwicket that de Villiers was attempting, mistimed it completely and Ferguson at mid-on ran a couple of yards to his left to snap a well-judged catch
full on middle, driven back to the bowler
slower ball bowled slightly short on the off stump, dabbed to point off the back foot
pitched up on the off stump, struck neatly down the ground to long-off
full on middle, turned to midwicket who's a little deep inside the circle so they manage a comfortable single
short of a length outside off, run down to third man
yorker on middle, dug out wide of a diving Hopes to long-on

he's done it before and commits the same mistake again, bowls a meaty length ball outside leg stump, Duminy clips it wide of short fine, Bracken gives chase, drags it back inside the ropes, only just, and the batsmen manage three
full on the off stump, driven firmly but straight to cover
swinging into the left hander, landed full on the off stump and moved in towards middle, pushed firmly to long-on
straying down the leg side, given a wide
slower ball bowled on a good length on leg stump, turned away to midwicket who's right at the circle
straying on the pads again but gets away with it, clipped towards short fine, fails to beat the fielder there ans settles for a single
full and wide, he's made too much room even before the ball's been delivered and struggles to reach it when its fired in wide of the off stump
beaten, landed on a good length outside off and moved away sharply to beat the batsman as he tried to prod at it from the crease
the end of a good over, this one came in, cramped Boucher for room and all he could do was defend it respectfully to the bowler
pushed off the front foot towards mid-off for a single
yorker length on middle and leg, gets a thick outside edge as he tries to dig it out in the direction of midwicket, gets a single towards deep cover
short of a length on middle and off, paddles it away wide of fine leg, there's cover in the deep but it's in the gap
full on middle and off, drilled down the ground to long-off
meaty length ball on middle, Boucher is quick to pounce on it, slogs it away into the stands behind deep midwicket
struck away to midwicket this time, persists with a slightly fuller length, but gets away with it this time

dropped, slower ball outside off, Duminy strikes it cleanly wide of Johnson at long-on, he runs to his left and reaches for it but spills it just short of the ropes, a tough chance but should have been snapped
full and wide, played wide of cover for a single
yorker length on middle, dug out into the off side for a single
full on the off stump, stroked through the in-field towards deep cover
full on middle, dug out towards midwicket
low full toss on the off stump, struck towards midwicket again, who's at the edge of the circle, allowing the batsmen run through for quick single
dropped, the third of the innings and probably the simplest of the lot, full on the off, lofted towards long-on where Hauritz running forward spilled a comfi
attempts a square-drive wide of point, gets a thick inside edge back to the bowler
low full toss on the off stump, reaches for it, dabs it wide of cover for a single
full on the off stump, dragged towards long-on from the crease
full on middle and off, bunts it wide of deep midwicket for a couple
short of a length outside off, makes room and slaps it towards deep cover
banged in short on leg stump, pulled away to deep square leg, inching towards 300 now
slower ball bowled on a good length on the off stump, makes room and strikes it uppishly wide of a diving Clarke at mid-off
Boucher opening up now, length ball on the off stump, slogged over midwicket for a one bounce four, straying in length here
full and wide, makes room and bunts it to deep cover to bring up the 300 for his team
Duminy into the act now, length ball again, attempting a yorker but not getting it right, Duminy moves his right foot out of the way and thumps that down the ground to beat a diving long-on
low full toss on the off stump, driven to long-on for a single to keep the strike in the final over
round the wicket and full on the pads, tries to hoick it over midwicket but makes no contact, is struck on the pads and they steal a leg bye
short of a length on the off stump, heaved away towards deep square leg
poor ball, full toss on middle and Duminy has not trouble dispatching it to the deep-midwicket boundary, a hard-hit pull and the ball raced way
low full toss on leg stump, struck in the same direction but all along the ground this time, two more
overpitched and he's made that midwicket region his pet area, full on the off stump and he smacks it cleanly to bisect the gap between long-on and deep midwicket
comes back well with a wicket off the last ball, short on middle and off, pulled away well but straight to Hussey at deep square leg who dives forward running in to take a sharp catch

inn2.comm: straying down the leg side, false start, Boucher dives full length to his left and does well to concede just two wides
off the mark straightaway, good length on the off stump, pushed wide of mid-off for a single
on middle and leg, dabbed into the leg side for a quick single
good length on the off stump and moving away sharply, left alone to the keeper
full on the pads and angling down further, tries to flick it past midwicket, misses, is struck on the pads and there's a stifled appeal
good length on the off stump, pushed off the front foot wide of mid-off for a couple
back of a length on middle, a hint of movement away from the batsmen, defended solidly towards mid-off
full outside off, struck firmly off the front foot, fielded well at cover
good length on the off stump, defended watchfully into the off side
goes after it, full on middle and leg, chipped well over mid-on, van der Merwe gives chase and jeeps them down to three runs
full outside off and moving away sharply, goes after it but is beaten by the swing
short of a good length on the off stump, guided to third man for a single
back of a length on the off stump, defended to cover
nicely done, just a fraction short outside off, makes room and punches it firmly through the covers, is getting into his groove here
back of a length on the off, pushed to cover off the back foot
good length on the off stump, defended to mid-off on the front foot
good length on the off stump and darting back in, gets outside the line to work it behind square, gets an inside edge onto his pads
back of a length on the off stump, pushed to midwicket off the back foot
slower ball, misdirected, is down the leg side but clips Clarke's pads on the way to the keeper
stunned silence around the ground as Haddin drills this one fiercely past mid-off to the boundary, was in the slot though, full on the off stump and he freed his arms
much better, came back in after landing on a good length on the off stump, defended back to the bowler
short on middle again, gets back and works it in front of mid-on for a quick single
short and wide, slashes hard, gets a thick outside edge past a diving third man, a good enough start for Australia here
full on middle and seaming away from the right hander, gets his front foot across and tries to drive through the line, ends up slicing it wide of short cover
full on the off, gets forward and drives it towards a deepish mid-off for a single
banged in short outside off, rocks back to dismiss it over midwicket, misses, a massive heave that and would have disappeared had he connected, a touch too quick perhaps
good length on the off stump, pushed back past the bowlers towards mid-on for a single
short and wide, comes down the track, makes room and cuts it away over point, easily done
slashed hard at it but this time it goes much finer, towards third man, runs have been fairly easy come by this innings so far
back of a length on middle, gets behind to defend, gets a thick outside edge towards point
short of a good length on the off stump, whips it towards midwicket
full outside off, comes forward and tries to cream that through the covers, gets an inside edge just shy of the off stump, and earns a couple towards fine leg
slightly short on the off stump, plays a short-arm pull towards midwicket
full on the off stump, stands tall and drives it straight to mid-off
good length on leg stump, tries to clip it fine, is struck on the thighs and they scamper a leg bye
back of a length on the off, punched to cover
short of a length on the off, makes room and slaps that straight to mid-off
fraction short outside off and jagged back in a touch, tried to chop it down wide of point but failed to connect
full on middle and leg, driven wirstily towards midwicket, will be disappointed for not having pierced the gap
good length on the off stump, defended to cover off the back foot, calls for the single but is sent back wisely
full on the off stump and angling in from wide of the crease, defended towards cover
slower ball bowled full on middle and leg, tries to turn it away fine, brushes Clarke's pads on the way to Boucher, good over this
and it's a maiden, full on middle and leg, driven straight to Duminy at midwicket who reacts quickly to prevent a single
fullish on the off stump, pushed through to mid-off, gently
short of a good length on the off, dabbed towards third man for a single
short of a length again, bowled at 143 kmph, chopped to third man once more
third man in action again, back of a length outside off, gets an edge off the bottom of the bat as he tries to smash that through point
full on the off stump, driven across the line to mid-on
good length on middle and leg, shuffles and glances it down fine to beat the fielder in the deep, a gift really, had been a fairly decent over until then
short of a good length on middle, walks across and turns it behind square
fullish on the off stump, makes room and creams that to the cover fielder who's right on the edge of the circle
good length on the off stump, driven to mid-on for a single
bouncer on the off stump, Clarke negotiates it without any difficulty
full on the off stump, driven slightly across the line to mid-on, Morkel is alert and shies at the stumps to keep the batsmen rooted to the crease
made room for himself but the bowler chased him, bowled it full outside leg, Clarke punched it down the ground wide of mid-off for a single
full outside off, tries to drag and dispatch it over midwicket, a blind swipe that and promptly misses
short of a length on middle, paddled down to fine leg for a single
full on the off stump, driven off the front foot to mid-on
back of a length on the off, opens the face to guide it to third man for a single
short of a good length on the off, turned away wide of midwicket for a single
full on the off stump, driven back to the bowler
fullish on the off stump, gets forward and drives it ti mid-on for a single
back of a length on the off, turned off the back foot to midwicket
short on middle, gets across and helps it on its way wide of short fine for a boundary, brings up the 50-stand, just what they had been hoping for
slightly short on middle, punched wide of midwicket off the back foot
short of a length outside off, stopped on him slightly, bunted to mid-off on the back foot
well struck but straight to the fielder, full and wide, driven crisply but fails to clear the in-field
That's disappeared, full, meaty, length ball on middle and off, just a slight shuffle, and clips it cleanly over the deep square-leg boundary
back of a length on the off stump, dabbed down to third man for a single
trying to bring it into the right hander, on middle and off, pushed short of mid-on for a single
Parnell's being punished here, a fraction full outside off and Haddin cashes in, swings it away over mid-on for a boundary, the crowd have had nothing to cheer in the past 40 minutes or so
there's a long-off in place now, full outside off and he drives it through the line into the deep
angling it away from the right hander from wide of the crease, eased through the covers for a single
full on the off stump, got to the pitch and tried to drive through the line, got a thick outside edge towards third man
the third man is up for Haddin and can only watch the ball roll down the boundary, short and wide, poor ball given the field, he just chops it behind the keeper and gets four without much effort
moved back in a touch, good length on the off stump, driven down the ground to long-on

third man, whether deep or inside the circle makes no difference for these two. Fullish outside off, waited for it and opened the face at the last moment to guide it delicately past the keeper and a diving third man for a boundary
full on the off stump, pushed wide of cover but fails to get the single
slower ball bowled short on the off stump, pulled away wide of square leg for a couple more
back of a length on middle, dropped dead onto the pitch
back of a length on middle, gets back and tucks it away wide of deep square leg for a single
bouncer, was in no control of it though, his fingers clipped the bails while he was bowling, went way over the batsman's head on the leg side
full on the off stump, driven through the line to mid-off for a single
back of a length on middle, defended to midwicket on the back foot
short on middle, pulled away just short of deep square leg who takes it on the bounce, a controlled shot in the end, he knew there was someone in the deep
came back in, landed on a good length outside off and moved in to strike him on the pads off the inside edge as he tried to drive that on the up past the bowler
short of a length outside off, cut away behind point, Botha gives chase from third man and dives to pull it back just inside the ropes
poor stuff from Kallis really, short and wide again, but gets away with just a single, cut away to straight to Botha at third man this time
back of a length on the off stump, defended with an open face to point
short on middle, comes down the track while making room to cart that over point, gets a thick edge to third man
slower one bowled slightly short on the off stump, defended off the back foot towards midwicket
full on the off stump, pushed wide of mid-off for a single
tossed up on the off stump, driven to midwicket
quicker one bowled short outside off, dabbed wide of point for a single
tossed up, lands on a good length on the off stump and spins in, pushed wide of midwicket
Haddin reaches his fifty in style, bowled full and flat outside off and is onto it quickly, smashes it over deep midwicket for a big six
another one, this one was tossed up on middle and leg, waited for it, bent low and slog-swept it into the crowd over deep midwicket again, they have paced their innings superbly here
flighted on the off stump, driven down towards long-off for a single
good length on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler off the front foot
short of a length outside off, chopped down to point
banged in short outside leg stump, tries to pull it away fine, stifled appeal from Boucher, the umpire rewards him with a wide

moved across quite a bit, landed on a good length on middle and struck him in line as he tried to work that behind square, would have probably knocked out leg stump but Kallis was the only one who appealed
short of a length on the off stump, pushed off the back foot to point
slower offcutter on the off stump, dropped short of cover, calls for a single but is sent back
missed run out, Clarke was out had that hit, pushed off the back foot towards Duminy at midwicket and set off immediately, a shy at the stumps at the non-striker's end but missed, albeit only just.
bowled flat on middle and leg, driven wide of the diving bowler towards long-on
short of a length on the off stump and spun away, dabbed to short third man
flighted on the off stump, struck straight to cover

arm ball on middle but dealt with very well, Haddin made room and slashed that wide of point, Parnell raced to his left to drag that back just inside the ropes. Or so we thought, he made contact with the ropes just as he slid to pull it back in
on middle and off, gets to the pitch and smacks it down the ground towards long-on
tossed up on middle, pushed to midwicket off the front foot
good length on middle and leg, presents the full face to push it to long-on
back of a length on middle and off, pushed back to the bowler
pushed through quicker on middle and leg, driven through the line, long-on in action again
the runs keep coming, full on middle, in the slot for Haddin who slaps who gets under it and swings it over midwicket
full on the off, driven firmly but straight to mid-off
feeding him with length balls here, struck back well towards Albie who gets his body in the way to prevent what would easily have been a couple more
quicker on the off stump, defended back onto the pitch
flat on middle and leg, driven to long-on
fullish on the off stump, steered wide of point for a couple
on middle, flighted, comes down the track and drives it to long-on
short of a length on middle and off, punched to cover
quicker one on middle, defended forward with a lunge

ooooh, almost! Flighted outside off, bends low and swats that wide of long-on, a valiant attempt by Wayne Parnell as he flings himself to his left to pull off a miraculous catch but the ball clips his fingers and lands bang on the ropes, the agony continues for South Africa
quicker one bowled full on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler
on middle and off, struck back firmly and Botha dives well to his right to prevent a single

Parnell's snapped it this time, flighted on the off stump, Haddin is tempted and attempts to clear long-on again, doesn't strike this as well as the previous one, gets more elevation than he would have wanted and finds Parnell, who takes it gleefully just inside the ropes
slightly short on the off stump, turned off the back foot behind square
flighted on middle and off, defended on the leg side
quicker one on the off stump, pushed through the covers for a single
pushed through quick on middle, played back past Merwe who dives well to his right to save a single
on middle and off, pushed through to cover off the front foot
tucked away behind square towards short fine
quicker one bowled full on middle, driven down the ground to long-on for a single
flighted on middle, comes down the track and bunts it to long-on again
low full toss on middle, down the track and played to long-on
spinning in sharply, landed on a good length outside off, defended off the back foot
gets forward and pushes it back towards Botha
runs not as easy to come by now, tossed up on middle, defended cautiously on the leg side
short of a length outside off, late-cuts it straight to short third
quicker through the air, full on the off stump, presents the full face to push it down to long-off
good length on middle and leg, gets the leading edge as he tries to push it down the leg side
bowled full outside off, comes down the track and slices that wide of cover for a couple more, fifty up for Clarke, he played an excellent supporting role to Haddin

he's gone now and South Africa have struck back with two quick wickets, forced much quicker through the air, landed on a good length on middle and spun away sharply, Clarke was beaten by the pace as well as the spin to watch is offstump pegged back
angling towards middle from wide of the crease, gets outside the line to push it into the leg side, struck on the pads, stifled appeal but we know that can't be given
worked away to deep square leg for a single
pushed off the front foot towards long-on
short of a length on middle and leg, worked to short fine
flighted on middle, chipped past the bowler to long-on
short of a length outside off and spinning in, cut away wide of point for a couple
tossed up on the off stump, driven down the ground to long-on
short on the off, walks across and turns it away to deep square leg

spin does the trick again, van der Merwe has turned this game around, similar ball to the one that got Clarke but bowled outside the off stump this time, Ferguson stepped out of his crease to play it into the off side but was done in by the sharp spin away from him, Boucher collected it cleanly and clipped off the bails to find the batsman just short
over the wicket to the left hander, on middle and off, turned away into the leg side
tossed up on middle and leg, tries to sweep it behind square, misses, is struck on the pads
quicker one on the off stump, coming in sharply, pushed wide of midwicket for a single
on middle and off, Ponting handles the spin well, getting behind it and dropping it on the leg side
short on the off stump, punched off the back foot to deep cover
short of a length on middle, pulled away to deep square leg
short of a length outside off, pushed off the back foot wide of de Villiers at cover who dives full length to his right to save a couple, the buzz is back at the ground now
good length on middle, pushed into the leg side
low full toss on the off stump, driven down to long-on for a single
flighted on the off stump, reaches forward to defend it back to the bowler
short of a length outside off, cut away towards deep cover
tossed up on middle and off, pushed into the off side towards deep cover
flighted outside off, gets outside the line to bunt it towards deep midwicket, is struck on the pads
flighted on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler

van der Merwe you beauty! Flatter, following up on three flighted deliveries, landed just a fraction outside off stump and turned in towards Hussey to rap him on the pads as he got onto the back foot to work it behind square. Replays indicate he was struck in line with leg stump
flighted on the off stump, pushed to cover
tossed up on middle, lunges forward to defend on the leg side
back of a length outside off, pushed off the back foot to deep cover
tossed up on middle and off, driven straight to midwicket
quicker on the off stump, dropped into the off side short of point
flighted outside off, closes the face to drive it towards long-on
flighted on the off stump, driven through the line between deep cover and long-off

rapped on the pads and Botha lets out a war cry, spun in from outside off to get Ponting on the pads as he tried to work it away on the leg side, was probably caught high on the knee roll and it could have even missed leg But worth an appeal though, replays, as they always do, make it appear much closer on the second viewing
on middle and leg, driven down the ground to long-on for a single
driven between long-off and deep cover for a couple more
pushed off the back foot towards long-off
fired in down the leg side, tries to sweep but misses
short on leg stump, whipped away off the back foot towards deep square leg
short of a length on the off stump, punched to cover on the back foot
quicker one on middle, defended back to the bowler
short of a length outside off, and spinning in, guided to short third
short on middle and leg, turned straight to square leg
quicker ball fired in full on middle, dug out towards midwicket
flighted on middle and leg, driven off the front foot towards deep midwicket
good length on the off stump, defended towards cover
the runs have dried up now, defended with a reach to cover once again
quicker ball bowled full on the off stump, chipped over cover between long-off and deep cover for a couple
short of a length on the off stump, eased wide of point for another run
short on middle and leg, turned away behind square for a single
short of a length outside off, cut away towards deep cover
back of a length on middle and leg, turned to midwicket
flighted on middle, gets across and flicks it behind square for a single
short of a length outside off, cut away behind point for a single
back of a length outside off, chopped to cover
tucked away behind square for a single
flighted on middle, drilled down the ground to long-on
good length on middle, pushed with an full face past Morkel towards long-on
full on middle and leg, driven firmly towards long-on for a single
short of a good length on the off stump, guided firmly to point
slower ball bowled on a good length on the off stump, dabbed behind point off the front foot
short of a length outside off, cut away to point off the back foot
full on middle and leg, driven down the ground to long-on for a single
short on middle and off, pushed off the back foot towards Duminy at deep midwicket
tossed up on middle, driven to long-on for a single
low full toss on the off stump, eased through to short cover, it's getting tougher by every over, they can't leave too many to get with too few to come now
flighted on middle and off, pushed wide of the bowler towards long-on
tossed up on middle and leg, tucked away behind square leg for a single
tries to be a little cheeky, fired in on leg stump and he attempts to sweep it fine, fails to beat the keeper
short of a length outside off and moving away, makes room to slash it wide of point but is beaten by the movement
first boundary in a long time, back of a length on the off stump and moving away, waited for it and guided just wide of the keeper to beat third man
another one, there's a slip in place now but it just manages to evade him, short and wide, slashes hard, flies off the outside edge over Gibbs at slip to the third-man boundary, important runs these
back of a length on middle, punches it back past the bowler for a couple more wide of mid-on, productive over so far

but that's where it stops for Australia, banged in short on middle, goes for the pull but it's onto him a little quickly, gets the top-edge and there are fielders converging to pouch that on the leg side, Steyn is the quickest to get to it and takes a good catch running to his right
back of a length on the off stump, pushed to point off the back foot
good length on leg stump, turned away in front of square wide of midwicket for a single
short on middle, pulled away off the back foot in the direction of deep square leg
an attempted yorker on middle, flicked away wide of midwicket for a single
swinging away, good length on the off and leaving the right hander, Ponting plays it well, moving across and driving it down the ground with a full face
bouncer banged in short on middle and leg, Hopes ducks under it, one for the over
short of a good length on middle, pushed back to the bowler
tossed up by van der Merwe, a bit of width and cut away off the backfoot wide of cover
and again a bit of room for the batsman to work with, he chops it down towards third man
closer to offstump, but the batsman backs away and dabs that towards cover point
driven firmly towards mid-off for a quick single
pushed through quickly by van der Merwe, defended back to the bowler by Hopes
full and on middle and leg, turned towards mid-on and the batsmen pinch a single
overpitched on middle, punched towards mid-on for a single
tossed up a touch more by Botha, Ponting tries to slam that towards long-on, doesn't quite get hold of it, and it rolls along to the long-on fielder
driven to long-on for a single
played with soft hands towards mid-off for a single
Hopes looks to glance it down to fine leg but the ball hits his pads and drops towards square leg
punched down the ground by Hopes for a single to retain the strike
pushed through, short and a bit wide, Hopes goes for an extravagant cut but misses the ball
a wide down the leg side, Boucher can't collect and the batsmen jog through for a single
gets forward and eases it wide of cover
down the leg side, clips his pads and they get a leg bye
fired in outside off, jammed towards sweeper cover
low full toss, pulled towards short midwicket
turned wide of short midwicket, the fielder picks and shies at the stumps, Ponting was just home
beautifully timed, full outside off, gets forward and drives it elegantly between mid-off and cover for a boundary
full and wide again, erring in length again, reaches forward, bends low and steers it wide of point and third man for a successive four. 100 needed off 58 now, still a tall ask
bang on target this time, fullish on middle, bowled at a decent pace as well, from wide of the crease and angling into the right hander, defended watchfully back to the bowler
Ponting's looking in prime form this over, good length on the off stump, he stood his ground and drove on the up to beat the diving mid-off, third boundary of the over

could this be the turning point? On middle and off and he shuffles across to tickle it past the short-fine fielder for another boundary, reaches his 67th ODI fifty, took him a while to get going but boy, he's looked good this over

He's gone now! What an eventful over, could well be the decisive blow. Held it back this time and banged it in short on middle, tried to pull it over midwicket, struck it well but couldn't clear him, Albie Morkel times his jump to perfection and Australia are pegged back again
yorker on middle, dug out into the leg side towards midwicket
good length on middle and off, defended cautiously back to the bowler
full on middle, driven firmly towards deep midwicket for a single
slower ball bowled short outside off, hangs his bat out and pushes it wide of cover for a single
full on the off stump, came forward and tried to cream that over the covers, got a thick inside edge wide of the leg stump towards the keeper
short of a good length on the off stump, defended off the back foot towards cover
good length on the off stump, Hopes makes room and slices that over the covers for a boundary
round the wicket now, good length on the on the off, driven wide of Parnell for a single towards long-on
full on middle, gets back and turns it towards deep midwicket for a single
full outside off, is down on one knee and swats it to long-off
full on the off stump, swings across the line and drills it down to long-on
Hopes is Australia's big hope now, short on the off stump, pulled away powerfully to beat deep midwicket, they need many more of these
slower ball on middle and leg, chips it towards long-on for a single
yorker length on middle, dug out in the direction of long-on
superb yorker on middle, Johnson has made room but the length just isn't right for him, in the blockhole, he fails to get his bat down in time and the stumps take a beating!
on middle and leg, driven down the ground to long-on
attempted yorker on middle, flicked away towards deep midwicket for a single
inswinger, full on the off stump, dug out wide of cover for quick single
short of a length on middle, hits him on the ribs as he tries to fend that away on the leg side, gets a single

good length on middle, he gets to the pitch and lofts it cleanly over the bowler's head, de Villiers flings himself to his left to pluck that out of thin air but it evades him and bounces just in front of the ropes
full on middle and off, flicked away in front of square for a couple wide of deep midwicket

good length on middle and leg but moved a hint away from the batsman, Hopes tried to clip that over the in-field on the leg side, was into the shot a little too early, lobbed off the outside-half of the bat in the direction of backward point where Gibbs took a dolly
short of a length on the off, swatted over the bowler's head just short of de Villiers at long-off
on middle and off, pushed firmly towards cover, decide against the single
the end is nearing for the visitors now! Slightly short on middle, Hauritz makes room to dab that down to third man, misses it completely and the ball crashes into the stumps
short of a length outside off, makes room to cut, misses
bowled at a fiery pace that, 152.1 kmph, zipped past Harwood even before he had decided to play the stroke
much fuller but almost touching 150 once again, Harwood slashes hard, predictably misses
Timber, It's all over! Full and straight, bang on middle, Harwood tries his level best to dig it out but can't get his bat down in time, the stumps are pegged back and the crowd roars
